## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines

### Privacy & Security
- [ ] No analytics or tracking code added

- [ ] Sensitive data is encrypted before storage
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or API keys

### PWA Requirements

- [ ] Service Worker cache strategy is appropriate
- [ ] No blocking network requests for core functionality

### Native App Parity

- [ ] Nostr event format is compatible
- [ ] Message encryption is compatible
